name: Mekansm
description: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

abilities.name: Restore
abilities.description: Restores health to nearby allies on cast.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Affects every allied unit, including illusions, invulnerable units and hidden units
Does not heal units that have been healed by Restore in the last 49 seconds, or Mend in the last 44 seconds
A status buff icon on affected units shows how much time is left for it to be able to get affected by the aforementioned abilities again
Units may only be affected by Restore once in a while, including units affected by Guardian Greaves

abilities.name: Mekansm Aura
abilities.description: Grants an aura that increases the health regeneration of nearby ally units.
notes: Can regenerate up to 150 health in one minute

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If a Guardian Greaves was purchased as well, Guardian Greaves' icon takes priority
